summary: Modder's resource: Seventeen unique saddles in three different sizes for Gypsy, Arab and Mustang horses. Meshes and Textures, no esp.
descriptionHtml:
Imperial and nord saddle retextures. Seventeen unique saddles in three different sizes to fit Gypsy, Mustang and Arab Horses. They fit also Vanilla horses.

This is meant as a modder's resource. Archive contains meshes and textures for you to use in your projects. All models use the imperial bridle.You can change them for each saddle with nifskope.

SE version made by PhysicsFish available here (not tested by me because I have no SE):
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/18522]Tasheni Saddles SE
[/url]
Please look at my other mods:

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92881]Tasheni Saddles Redguard Collection
[/url]
Unique and custom voiced followers with banter scenes, unique behaviour and background:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85381/?]Tasheni Followers - One for All and All for One
[/url]﻿
You need a fitting horse? Look here:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90429/]Winterhorses - Tasheni Mod Project
[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87775/?]Stony Creek Farm
[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86538]Tutorial - Making Custom Dialogue with high quality sound
[/url]
author: Tasheni
